tooltips.install_open_we: Install wallpaper and open in Wallpaper Engine

messages.already_installed:
These wallpapers are already installed,
check the Wallpapers tab!
messages.cannot_delete_active:
These wallpapers are currently active.
Please change your wallpaper first before deleting.
messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this wallpaper?
messages.invalid_input: No valid Workshop IDs or links found.
messages.invalid_id: Please enter a valid numeric ID.
messages.exit_with_downloads:
You have incomplete downloads or extractions.
Close the window?
messages.exit_with_downloads_only:
You have incomplete downloads.
Close the window?
messages.exit_with_extractions_only:
You have incomplete extractions.
Close the window?
messages.dotnet_required: This application requires .NET 9 Desktop Runtime for some plugins to work properly.
messages.dotnet_install_now: Would you like to install it now?
messages.dotnet_installation_started:
.NET 9 Desktop Runtime installation has started.
Please complete the installation and click OK.
messages.dotnet_installation_failed:
.NET 9 Desktop Runtime couldn't find the installer.
Please download it manually from:
https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/9.0/runtime
messages.dotnet_warning:
.NET 9 Desktop Runtime is necessary for the correct operation of the application.
Please come back when you are ready to install it.
messages.batch_input_placeholder:
Enter Workshop IDs and/or URLs
(space or newline separated):

info.description: This application allows you to easily download and manage Wallpaper Engine wallpapers from Steam Workshop.
